title: Pinball FX2
notes:
Performance: good. Some slight FPS drops sometimes, it seems, but am not 100% sure of that.
Loading times for pinball tables seem slightly longer than I remembered from Windows, still loads up quite fast (10-15 seconds on my SSD).

Error: Slight audio crunch/weirdness when loading a pinball table, this is only for 0,5 seconds or so, and it goes away automatically.

DLC-addons: I've tested some of my Pinball DLC tables: Plants Vs Zombies, Rome, they worked  fine. 

Preview tables function: I've also tried the preview function of pinball tables I don't own (for me this was for example: American Dad) and this loaded up just as expected.

The options menu works as expected, also anti-aliasing functions work.

Controller support: tested my Xbox360 controller, this worked great. Nudging the table works, the flippers are snappy.

title: Pinball FX2
notes: Native experience, including all graphics options
